category-def.name: llvm4eclipsecdt
category-def.label: LLVM plugin for Eclipse CDT
category-def.description: LLVM plugin for Eclipse CDT provides LLVM toolchain support for Eclipse CDT. It can compile C and C++ program code with Clang or llvm-gcc front-ends using LLVM as a back-end. LLVM tools such as assembler, archiver, linker, static compiler (llc), JIT/Interpreter (lli) are featured and can be configured via graphical user interface (Project->Properties->C/C++ Build->Settings). Plugin supports Linux and Windows with MinGW and Cygwin.
